meanings.definition: A large painting on a wall or ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The murals in the museum were colorful and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The city is known for its beautiful murals that brighten up the streets.
meanings.sent3: The children were amazed by the murals, thinking they could step into the painted world.
meanings.sent4: The murals on the walls transformed the dull alley into a vibrant art gallery.
meanings.sent5: As I walked through the ancient ruins, the murals told stories of the past in vivid colors.

meanings.definition: A work of art executed directly on a wall.
meanings.sent1: The artist spent weeks creating the intricate murals in the school hallway.
meanings.sent2: Visitors from around the world come to admire the famous murals in the city.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat seemed to think the murals were real windows to the outside world.
meanings.sent4: The murals on the building seemed to come alive as the sun set, casting long shadows.
meanings.sent5: The murals on the subway walls added a touch of beauty to the daily commute.
